h2_title: Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: He can also simply belly flop down, requiring you to dodge to the side rather than backwards.This move can come from the front, as well as from the sides if he collapses on his side, meaning even if you aren’t attacking from the front you won’t automatically be safe.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Bear_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Black Bear Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also simply belly flop down, requiring you to dodge to the side rather than backwards.This move can come from the front, as well as from the sides if he collapses on his side, meaning even if you aren’t attacking from the front you won’t automatically be safe.
